WorkItem.Description:
We encountered a severe stability problem with the datagrid (WPFToolkit) in our application that raises the following exceptions:
DataGridCellsPanel: 1522 Debug.Assert(children.Count > blockElementCount, "Element count from blocks can't be less than total children count"); 
VirtualizedCellInfoCollection: 95 Debug.Assert(!Contains(cell), "VirtualizedCellInfoCollection does not support duplicate items.");
 
In order to reproduce the problem we created a small application (see attached file) with many rows and columns.
The exceptions do not occur immediatly but if one scrolls the grid up and down it crashes regularly.
 
Any ideas for a fix or workaround?
 
Regards
Frank

Comments.Message: We agree this is a bug and are tracking it in our internal database to be fixed in a future release.
